cs.GT, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.DS, cs.MA. 

The paper deals with learnability in repeated zero-sum games, which is a topic in game theory (cs.GT). It also involves learning strategies and probabilistic learning, which are topics in artificial intelligence (cs.AI) and machine learning (cs.LG). The paper also presents a key lemma, which is a mathematical result, and discusses families of games, which can be seen as a type of data structure, both of which are topics in data structures and algorithms (cs.DS). Finally, the paper deals with the concept of bounded loss, which is a topic in optimization and control (cs.MA).
